short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: xStockFilter is a powerful tool that filters tweets based on specific tags or phrases and the number of stock mentions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: xStockFilter is a Chrome extension designed to declutter your x/Twitter feed by filtering out unwanted tweets related to stocks. Set a limit for the number of stock symbols allowed in a tweet and hide tweets that exceed it. Additionally, add custom words or phrases to block tweets containing specific terms. xStockFilter automatically hides or overlays tweets, helping you focus on relevant content and streamline your Twitter experience. Perfect for traders and finance enthusiasts who want a cleaner, more focused feed.
